en.sc1: Insertion Sort starts with the record in position 1.
en.sc2: Since this is smaller than the value to its left, swap them.
en.sc3: Now we are done with this record since it can't move further left.
en.sc4: Now we are ready to process the record in position 2.
en.sc5: We will compare it to the record in position 1.
en.sc6: Since the record in position 2 is smaller, swap them.
en.sc7: Now compare against the record in position 0.
en.sc8: Since the record currently in position 1 is not smaller than the one in position 0, we are done with it.
en.sc9: Now we are ready to process the record in position 3.
en.sc10: We will compare it to the record in position 2.
en.sc11: Since the record in position 2 is smaller, nothing changes and we are done with the record in position 3.
